languages.text: "Простите великодушно, Лорд-капитан! Ваш сапог... сейчас все почищу!"
"My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... I'll clean it right away!"
languages.original_text: "Простите великодушно, Лорд-капитан! Ваш сапог... сейчас все почищу!"

traits.locale_text: "My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... give me a moment and I'll clean it!"
"My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... give me a moment and I'll clean it!"
"My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... I'll clean it right away!"
"My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... I'll clean it right away!"
"My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... I'll clean it right away!"

languages.text: «¡Mis más sinceras disculpas, Lord Capitán! Su bota... ¡La limpiaré de inmediato!».
languages.original_text: "My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... I'll clean it right away!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Mis más sinceras disculpas, Lord Capitán! Su bota... ¡La limpiaré de inmediato!».

languages.text: 「誠に申し訳ございません、ロード・キャプテン！ブーツが…今すぐきれいにします！」
languages.original_text: "My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... I'll clean it right away!"

traits.locale_text: 「誠に申し訳ございません、ロード・キャプテン！ブーツが…今すぐきれいにします！」

languages.text: “我真诚地向您道歉，舰长大人！您的靴子……我马上擦干净！”
languages.original_text: "My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... I'll clean it right away!"

traits.locale_text: “我真诚地向您道歉，舰长大人！您的靴子……我马上擦干净！”

languages.text: "Ich bitte untertänigst um Verzeihung, Lord Captain! Euer Stiefel ... Ich werde ihn sofort reinigen!"
languages.original_text: "My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... I'll clean it right away!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte untertänigst um Verzeihung, Lord Captain! Euer Stiefel ... Ich werde ihn sofort reinigen!"

languages.text: « Mes plus sincères excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Vos bottes... Je vais les nettoyer sur-le-champ ! »
languages.original_text: "My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... I'll clean it right away!"

traits.locale_text: « Mes plus sincères excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Vos bottes... Je vais les nettoyer sur-le-champ ! »

languages.text: "Tüm içtenliğimle özürlerimi sunarım Lord Kaptan! Botunuz... Onu hemen temizleyeceğim!"
languages.original_text: "My sincerest apologies, Lord Captain! Your boot... I'll clean it right away!"
